greetings.message: Hello, I'm Jason. What do you want to know ?

choices.cmd: I want to learn about energy balls.
What am I supposed to know ?

combat_training.message: To fight a monster, when you're near it, press 'A'. You can either maintain A down, or press it multiple times to enchain attacks.

energy_balls_training.message: To launch an energy ball, press 'F'. You can maintain F down to launch in combo.

others_training.message: A little tip: you can press E and launch enerby balls and attack at the same time, it will speed up !

sarah_quest.message: Sarah is looking for you, in City 32. She wants you to bring her alcohol and herbs to make gin for tonight.
